title: Well time to make myself a coffee.
body:
I'll also have time to ponder on the fact this system is stupid as hell.
http://i.gyazo.com/6363c6fc2f0eb5e440d226f284ad1f70.png

replies.body: stop doing stupid %%%% that gets you bustered?

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=64ed5tTf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-08T16:04:18.146+0000)
>
> stop doing stupid %%%% that gets you bustered?

I'm sorry but if my team is idiotic and feeds, I'm not wasting 20 minutes of my life with them, I'll alt+F4 and go play a game where your team is actually a team and not calls everyone morons.
If that's your logic then you have no reason to complain about the punishment. Suck it up, play the game - if you don't, suck it up and cop the punishment.

In a way this is kinda where this system is flawed. You have a fair point there, refuting to put up with non communicative teams, but this system punishes leaving under any circumstance. So where leaving games with trolls gets you punished, they roam free, for a time.

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=64ed5tTf,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-08T16:29:05.964+0000)
>
> In a way this is kinda where this system is flawed. You have a fair point there, refuting to put up with non communicative teams, but this system punishes leaving under any circumstance. So where leaving games with trolls gets you punished, they roam free, for a time.

I'm not leaving because I died, or whatever.. I leave because if i stay I'll end up abusing people, I know myself enough to know me leaving is better in the end then abusing 4 people and making everyone feel like crap, but this.. this doesn't teach me anything. I complained about it before. Seems the timer keeps adding up which is just going to irritate me before the game even starts.
Could always just leave LoL running in the background of another game and tab in every few minutes to move around so you don't get kicked for being AFK?
/mute all and move on. Drag the chat window off screen if you have to. Then play Single Player and do what you want.
